backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, contact submissions, and admin/user authorization using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend components, hooks, utilities, and layout elements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing sections, navigation, decorative UI, footer, and admin panel within a light theme layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Floating admin panel trigger showing login control and submissions panel when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSubmi: Admin-only view loading and displaying contact submissions with permission checks and formatted details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling auth state, errors, and cache clearing.
Component rendering a mouse-following spotlight effect on devices with fine pointers unless reduced motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBackgr: Fixed decorative background with images and gradient overlays for visual ambiance.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glassmorphism card wrapper with optional hover animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with scroll‑reveal animation and descriptive text inside a GlassCard component.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via a custom hook, success/error handling, and scroll‑reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with parallax graphics, social links, and scroll‑to interactions using reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows a grid of predefined projects with images, tags, and external links, animated with scroll‑reveal.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Lists skills with icons in a responsive grid, each animated with scroll‑reveal and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with smooth scrolling, mobile sheet menu, and scroll-responsive styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
Handles contact form submission through the backend actor using a mutation with success state and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and logout states. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes identity and status flags through a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a parallax scroll effect hook that updates an offset based on scroll position unless reduced-motion is preferred.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting via matchMedia and updates reactively.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch all submissions and check admin status using an actor returned from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Provides a hook that uses IntersectionObserver to mark elements visible when scrolled into view, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining light theme variables, accessibility styles, animations, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains simple validation helpers for required fields and email format checking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors, radii, shadows, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, theme specifications, known issues, and architectural notes for the portfolio site.
